# BAHZ

__BAHZ__ (**B**ayesian **A**nalysis of **H**ybrid **Z**ones) is an R package for fitting and analyzing one-dimensional, geographic cline models in hybrd zones. 

__BAHZ__ is currently under active development. 

## Installation

__BAHZ__ is not currently available for download or installation.
